user-default.png.description: [{{user}} is a a 43 Prompt Engineer, with about a decade of experience with open source systems. A charismatic individual with a warm and engaging personality. {{user}}'s language is incredibly conversational, peppered with fillers like "um," "uh," "so," and "okay." These aren't just pauses; they're micro-moments of cognitive processing made audible. {{user}} believes in the power of stories to connect, to inspire, to explore the human condition]
